original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency, you will play a pivotal role in developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to drive innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to comprehend business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Experience in the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Proven track record in the implementation and application of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using a range of data analysis and reporting tools
- Expertise in configuration management and version control systems

This multifaceted role combines business acumen and technical proficiency, empowering you to understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key member of the team, you will play a crucial role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at optimal efficiency. This position will focus heavily on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to drive innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to comprehend business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and promptly addressing any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management best practices
- Experience in the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Proven track record in the successful implementation and application of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working within Agile frameworks and methodologies
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing a range of data analysis and reporting tools
- Expertise in configuration management and version control systems

This dynamic role blends business acumen and technical expertise, empowering you to understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key member of the team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency. This position will focus heavily on developing innovative processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to drive groundbreaking solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to deeply understand business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and promptly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, identify inefficiencies, and discover opportunities for improvement, leveraging advanced database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to derive valuable insights.
- Proactively identify and propose ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry-leading best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions and ensure their seamless integration.
- Maintain comprehensive and user-friendly documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for diverse audiences
- Hands-on experience
